title: Rebecca Long Bailey – 2018 Speech at Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Rebecca Long Bailey, the Shadow Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy Secretary, at the Labour Party conference held in Liverpool on 25 September 2018.

Household names such as Toys R Us and Maplin have disappeared and big brands like New Look and M&S are closing stores across the country.
